title: 820-00840 No USB charge
message:
Hi,
i contact you for this mac, the board is very clean. The mac no charge (the tester stay black, no power)
i find D3300 and D3400 short, i change it and after it work well. i think it's good but, the customer come back, D3400 is short again.
i find the mac is very slow for change 5V to 20V (10-20sec). what is causing this?
thanks

title: 820-00840 No USB charge
message: Check if client has original Apple charger...

title: 820-00840 No USB charge
message:
i use an original charger 96W, and i wait the original of my customer.
is it normal? it's a long wait to change 5v -> 20V

title: 820-00840 No USB charge
message:
Can take 3-5s to switch input voltage, that is not a big problem.
But fake charger can damage the board.
